dublin_core.dcvalue: The aims of this study were to evaluate the weekly and annual cumulative radiofrequency electromagnetic field RF EMF exposure attributed to mobile phone MP use and assess whether a novel app Quanta Monitor could be employed in a small human sample to characterise the RF EMF exposures associated with the use of MPs Ten participants provided their two months daily objective data on their MP exposures i e transmitted and received power densities attributed to different modes of MP usage such as cellular calls cellular data and Wi Fi The results demonstrated that total transmitted power density cellular phone calls data and Wi Fi surfing could be many orders of magnitude higher than that from the total received power density Of the total transmitted power density cellular data use contributed the largest portion Our study showed that Quanta Monitor could be employed in prospective assessment of exposures to MPs in epidemiological studies
Australasian physical And engineering sciences in medicine
Estimating transmitted power density from mobile phone: an epidemiological pilot study with a software modified phone.
